rev.comment: External links Divorce Judgement in full
/* Marriage to Heather Mills */ English pounds first.
After the divorce ruling, Justice Bennett said that throughout the case Mills was "inconsistent and inaccurate" while McCartney was "honest." Adding references
/* Marriage to Heather Mills */ financial terms finalized; divorce won't be final for another couple months
/* Relationships and marriages */ Divorce not final, minor edits
The settlement equates to about $34,500 (£17,000) for each day of McCartney's marriage to Mills.<ref>Mills awarded £24.3m settlement[http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/entertainment/7300931.stm]
Pay Beatrice £35,000 ($70,000) a year, until she is 18, or ends secondary education.<ref>BBC: Mills gave 'inaccurate' evidence. [http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/entertainment/7302736.stm]
Adding source. BBC: Mills gave 'inaccurate' evidence. [http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/entertainment/7302736.stm]
Adding source: BBC. Neutral Citation Number: [2008] EWHC 401 (Fam) Between : James Paul McCartney Petitioner/ Respondent -and- Heather Anne Mills McCartney Respondent/ Applicant

He is a serious composer; over the last four decades he published and released hundreds of his own compositions including choral music, symphonies, songs and film scores.
A high profile public figure; he is a cultural icon whose entertainment and humanitarian activities are equally valuable.

He's officially knighted Sir Paul McCartney (althought Sir James Paul McCartney is of course also correct)
